address: Lvivsky lane, 3a, Zhytomyr, Zhytomyr Region, Ukraine, 10000

hero.barbeque: Immerse yourself in the world of aromatic and juicy barbecue at our cozy restaurant!
hero.banquet: Discover our elegant banquet halls for weddings, corporate events, and special occasions.
hero.dishes: Taste the best dishes made of selected ingredients, perfectly paired with exquisite wines.
hero.bar: Our bar menu includes a variety of alcoholic and non-alcoholic drinks, from classic cocktails to unique signature mixes.

sections.ourHistory: - is a European cuisine restaurant located in the heart of Zhytomyr. Our story began in 2010 when a group of food enthusiasts decided to open a place where people could enjoy delicious food and a cozy atmosphere.
sections.promotion: From 12 to 3pm, we will prepare complex lunches for you based on homemade recipes using only fresh ingredients. Our goal is to make your lunch delicious and cozy, just like home.
sections.ourMenuTitle: Our head chef has prepared sophisticated dishes of various cuisines for you.
sections.ourMenu: - we offer a menu with dishes to suit every taste and budget - from simple appetizers and soups to exquisite main courses and desserts. We constantly update our menu to offer you new tastes and combinations.

about.descriptionTitle: A restaurant where gourmets meet with high quality and cozy atmosphere.
description: Shafran is a cozy place located in the city center. Inside, you will find a stylish interior with soft lighting, soft chairs, and pleasant music.

Shafran is a European cuisine restaurant that uses only fresh ingredients and classic recipes. Here you can enjoy a wide selection of dishes, from soups and salads to meat and fish dishes, as well as various side dishes and desserts.
The feature of Shafran is a wide selection of dishes using local ingredients, which add an unusual taste and aroma to the dishes.
In addition, Shafran restaurant offers a rich selection of drinks - from freshly squeezed juices and fruit drinks to wine and strong alcoholic beverages.

The service at Shafran restaurant is top-notch, the staff is friendly and ready to help you with the selection of dishes and drinks. Overall, Shafran is a great place to enjoy classic European cuisine in a cozy atmosphere.
about.historyTitle: Taste and quality on every plate.
history: The owners of the restaurant "Shafran" are Valery and Maria, who have been living in Zhytomyr for many years. Both of them are foodies and value high-quality food, so they decided to create a restaurant that would offer its guests only the best dishes.

The idea of "Shafran" restaurant was born thanks to their love of European cuisine, which is rich in flavors and aromas. They wanted to create a place where guests could enjoy high-quality food, pleasant atmosphere, and excellent service.
Therefore, they began to search for the best ingredients, explore new recipes, and create a unique menu that would combine classic European dishes and unique author's creations.

The "Shafran" restaurant was opened in 2010 and since then has become one of the most popular restaurants in Zhytomyr. It quickly won the hearts of guests thanks to its delicious food, beautiful atmosphere, and impeccable service.

Today, the "Shafran" restaurant is a place where you can have a romantic dinner, celebrate a special occasion, or simply enjoy delicious food in a pleasant atmosphere. The owners of the restaurant still maintain the quality of the products and service to make guests feel at home and want to come back again and again.

menuDescription.porkShashlik: Juicy shish kebab with tender meat, infused with aromatic spices and grilled to perfection.
menuDescription.barrelAssortment: Assortment from the barrel consists of juicy tomatoes, fresh cucumbers, and tender zucchinis, creating a perfect blend of vegetable flavors.
menuDescription.chocolateFondant: Chocolate fondant is a delicate dessert with a hot molten chocolate center that melts in your mouth and is accompanied by a fragrant and bubbly texture on the outside.
menuDescription.turkeyFilletWithPeach: Turkey fillet with peach - a tender and delicious dish that combines juicy turkey fillet with sweet notes of succulent peaches.
menuDescription.duckBreastBerry: Duck breast with berry sauce - an exquisite dish where juicy duck breast perfectly combines with a flavorful and sweet sauce made from fresh berries.
menuDescription.duckFruits: A dish where tender duck meat harmoniously combines with flavorful fruits, creating a rich and satisfying taste experience.
menuDescription.roastedVealRackVegetables: A delicious dish where tender veal rack is combined with fresh vegetables, creating a balance of flavors and aromas.
menuDescription.salmonSpinach: A delicious dish where tender salmon is combined with fresh spinach, creating a flavorful harmony.
menuDescription.sweetPancakes: A tasty dish where thin pancakes delight with their sweet flavor and are served with various fillings or syrups.
menuDescription.crepesCaviar: A delicate dish where tender crepes beautifully complement luxurious caviar, creating an exquisite culinary experience.
menuDescription.meatDelicacies: Sophisticated meat dishes that are known for their refined taste and texture.
menuDescription.meatMedallions: Pieces of meat that are prepared in a special way to ensure tenderness and juiciness.
menuDescription.liverRoll: A dish made from tender pieces of liver, usually lamb or pork, that are wrapped and formed into a roll.
menuDescription.profiterolesSalmon: An exquisite dish made from delicate profiteroles filled with succulent salmon meat.
menuDescription.fishAssortment: A delicious dish that consists of various types of fish prepared in different ways.
menuDescription.caesarSalad: popular salad that consists of fresh lettuce leaves, grilled chicken, croutons, Parmesan cheese, boiled eggs, and Caesar dressing. This salad is known for its rich flavor and distinctive dressing that gives it a unique touch.
menuDescription.grilledVealSalad: A delicious salad where the main component is tender veal, grilled to perfection. It is complemented with fresh vegetables, herbs, and a flavorful dressing that adds richness and appetizing appeal to the salad.
menuDescription.grilledMackerel: A dish that involves grilling or frying fresh mackerel, a flavorful and aromatic sea fish. Grilled mackerel typically has a crispy skin and tender, juicy flesh.
menuDescription.cheesePlatter: A dish where various types of cheeses are arranged on a board or plate, creating a colorful palette of flavors and textures.
menuDescription.turkeyTerrine: dish made from tender turkey meat. It typically has a smooth, creamy texture, achieved by finely mincing the meat and combining it with other ingredients such as spices, herbs, or vegetables.
menuDescription.stuffedPike: A dish in which a whole pike is filled with a stuffing and prepared using various cooking methods, imparting a distinctive flavor and texture to the dish.
menuDescription.bloodSausageSkillet: A dish made with blood sausage that is pan-fried until golden brown. It is a popular traditional dish known for its rich flavor and aroma, and can be served as a main course or as an appetizer.
menuDescription.bigos: Bigos, also known as Polish hunter's stew, is a traditional dish from Polish cuisine. It consists of sauerkraut, meat (usually pork or sausage), potatoes, and spices. It is prepared through long simmering and has a rich flavor with distinct notes of sauerkraut and meat.
menuDescription.porkKnuckle: A delicious dish that combines juicy pork knuckle with tender braised cabbage. The knuckle has a crispy skin and the inside is characterized by its succulence and unique flavor.
menuDescription.cauliflowerWithCream: A delightful dish where tender and flavorful cauliflower is cooked in cream. The cauliflower retains its crispiness and unique taste, enhanced by the cream that provides a rich and creamy flavor to the dish.
menuDescription.vealLeaver: A delicious dish made from tender veal liver that has a delicate texture and rich flavor. It is prepared with various spices and seasonings that give it a distinctive aroma and flavor nuances.
menuDescription.seafoodPasta: A hearty and flavorful dish that features fragrant pasta combined with fresh seafood. It offers a rich taste and a unique combination of textures, delivering an unforgettable culinary experience.
menuDescription.xxlBeef: It is an ideal choice for true meat lovers who want to indulge in the taste and texture of high-quality beef dishes.
menuDescription.xxlPork: All the dishes are prepared using the finest ingredients and seasonings to ensure a rich flavor and unmatched aroma.
